# UTType.ReferenceType

**Type Alias**

An alias for the associated reference type.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ReferenceType = UTTypeReference
```

## Identifying a type

- **identifier**: The string that represents the type.

items.description: The string that represents the type.
items.name: identifier
